Questions.Title: The Wheellock Pistol
Questions.Body: The main andvantages (and dangers) of  the Wheellock Pistol are:
Options: The ignition. Permitting to hide the weapon under the clothes.
The magazine: more ammo, means more deaths.
The gunsight. Allowing to hit a target tenth of meters away without fail.

Questions.Title: The Batavia Shipwreck
Questions.Body: Among the following events, which one never happened once the Batavia shipwrecked.
Options: The survivor were split among several minor islands with the purpose of letting them die of starvation.
During a dinner, six out of seven preacher's sons were killed by axe. The seventh "voluntarily" became concubine of one of the aggressors.
The ship captain and first officer were killed in their sleep using parts of the ship as murder weapon.
Once captured, the violence leader tried to suicide before the execution. Since the poison was spoiled, he just ended up passing his last hours between vomit and diarrhea.

Questions.Title: Nabucodonosor II, legendary Babylon king
Questions.Body: Nabucodonosor II never managed to conquer Jerusalem. As a matter of fact, he is remembered for going insane due to his obsession for the city.

Questions.Title: The Gaugamela Battle
Questions.Body: In 331 BC Dario's army was deployed in battle position: the Great King was in the center, flanked by the noble cavalry and the %s squadron.

Questions.Title: Looking for Genghis Khan's Tomb
Questions.Body: For what reasons is it so hard to find Genghis Khan Tomb?
Options: Thousands of horses trampled the ground to hide any trace and thousands of tree where planted there and in the surrounding area.
Mongolians don't want to find the tomb, as this would mean to disturb Genghis Khan slumber.
All those that took part to the funeral were killed shortly after the ceremony. Then the guards that did it were killed themselves.
It is hard to choose a place to look, since mongolians where nomads.
Russia itself doesn't like people to look for it.

Questions.Title: The Explosive Guy Fawkes
Questions.Body: Guy Fawkes is the most known face of the infamous Gunpowder Plot, but what was his role among the thirteen catholics that schemed it?
Options: The ex soldier that was guarding the gunpowder barrels when the scheme was discovered.
The original founder of the group, that served as inspiration for the plot.
The first to join the group and second in command. He led the last stand once the plot was discovered.
